law.catch_line: Copy of order effectual as probate or letters.
law.text: A copy of the order by which a certificate is granted to any personal representative obtaining probate or letters of administration shall be as effectual as the probate or letters made out in due form. The clerk of the court making such an order shall, when required by any personal representative, make out such letters and probate in due form, and certify them, under the seal of his court.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 3842.
